text: tatha jab ve (eesaee) us (quraan) ko sunate hain, jo rasool par utara hai, to aap dekhate hain ki unakee aankhen aansoo se ubal rahee hain, us saty ke kaaran, jise unhonne pahachaan liya hai. ve kahate hain, he hamaare paalanahaar! ham eemaan le aaye, atah hamen (saty) ke saathiyon mein likh[1] le
